body.caption: Delta Centre and the beautiful summer
For the next 3 years I will be studying Informatics at University of Tartu!
Tonight on the menu: perfect medium rare grass-fed steak
How are you all liking WAD course so far? Been busy with the first homework but I would say it's quite nice.

FOR SALE!
I am putting my old MacBook Pro up for sale. It was purchased in 2020, battery health at 85%. Everything works fine, just some minor scratches.
For more information contact me: web.application@development.ee
Hello everyone, this is my first post here!
It is my birthday in 5 days, im turning 22 years old. Oh how time flies. I still remember how it was 2020 and we all had to quarantine due to Covid-19, feels like it was just yesterday...
People who live in dorms - how is it like? I bet it feels good to live so close to school but do you sometimes lack peace and privacy?
Week 9 of this semester has been conquered succesfully, got to keep up the good work as I am trying to up my GPA :)
